name: 蔡一豪
objective:
本課程旨在介紹 Python 程式設計的基礎知識。課程涵蓋 Python 語言的基本概念、數據結構、函式與模組，學生將能夠掌握 Python 程式設計並能夠應用於解決實際問題。
This course aims to introduce the basic knowledge of Python programming. The course covers fundamental concepts of the Python language, data structures, functions, and modules. Students will be able to master Python programming and apply it to solve real-world problems.
